Frequently Asked Questions

Is eeosk really free to use?

Yes, eeosk is a free service for building your own store with products from the eeosk catalog. It’s not a “freemium” service... it’s completely free! As in, “you don’t even need a credit card to use it” free. You may choose to spend money to advertise your store on places like Google and Facebook, but that is completely optional.

How do I get paid?

We pay you selling fees on qualifying purchases on a regular basis according to our Terms & Conditions. Please add your PayPal information in the Account Settings tab so we know where to send payments.

How do customers pay for what they buy from my eeosk store?

All payments are made securely through PayPal, which stores any sales data on a secure, encrypted server behind a firewall.

What credit cards can my customers pay with?

Customers can pay with Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover, or customers can choose to pay with PayPal.

How do shipping and returns work?

Shipments are made directly from our suppliers’ warehouses right to your customer’s door. If you or your customer would like to return a purchase made through an eeosk storefront please contact us at help@eeosk.com.

What are the shipping costs for customers buying from an eeosk store?

Shipping costs vary by product and are added to the order total when the customer adds a product to their shopping cart. To see the shipping cost of a particular product, click on it and then look in the details section below the product.

How do order cancellations work?

If you or your customer would like to cancel a purchase made through an eeosk storefront please contact us at help@eeosk.com. If the order has already shipped please follow the return policy outlined above.

How do I link my eeosk store to my blog?

Once you’ve created your store, visit the “Edit” section and simply enter the URL to your blog (e.g. http://blog.example.com). Your store will then have a link to your blog in its top bar and footer. You can also place links to your store anywhere on your blog.

How can I add my products to the eeosk catalog?

We are always adding new products to the eeosk catalog. Please contact us at hello@eeosk.com to learn more about how to have your products featured in the eeosk catalog.

How does eeosk make money?

We keep the lights on by earning a small percentage of each product’s price in the eeosk catalog. This percentage is already built into the price you see and is not deducted from your earnings.

What do you do with my information?

With your permission, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates. When you purchase something from an eeosk store, as part of the buying and selling process, we collect the personal information you give us such as your name, address and email address, but we do not collect your payment information. More detailed information is available in our Privacy Policy.
